se.chalmers.dat255.risk.model

Class Province

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.chalmers.dat255.risk.model.Province
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProvince

    public class Province
extends java.lang.Object
implements IProvince
    Simulates a province on the world map. Contains a number of units and handles troop movement.
